    public abstract static class KafkaAvroEventReporter.Builder<T extends KafkaAvroEventReporter.Builder<T>>
extends KafkaEventReporter.Builder<T>
    Builder for KafkaAvroEventReporter. Defaults to no filter, reporting rates in seconds and times in milliseconds.
